New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers extend their unbeaten streak, starting 11-0 for the 12th time in NBA history
Key Match Events: Cleveland Cavaliers rally from a 13-point deficit in the fourth quarter to defeat the Brooklyn Nets
Evan Mobley and Darius Garland ignite the Cavs' 16-4 run to close the game
Darius Garland sparks the run with a driving layup and clutch free throws
Evan Mobley punctuates the win with a big swat before the buzzer
Post-Match Reflections: Darius Garland expresses pride in the team's effort after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland Cavaliers are one of six teams in NBA history to make the NBA Finals after a 11-0 start
